subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Alex Galchenyuk scored 3 minutes 40 seconds into overtime in a win that gave the Canadiens a two-games-to-none lead in their first-round playoff series.
snippet: Alex Galchenyuk scored 3 minutes 40 seconds into overtime in a win that gave the Canadiens a two-games-to-none lead in their first-round playoff series.
